20110122010458.000|20110122010459.000|CC1|>>> THE GARDENA HIGH SCHOOL     
20110122010459.000|20110122010500.000|CC1|STUDENT WHO ALLEGEDLY WOUNDED   
20110122010500.000|20110122010502.000|CC1|TWO CLASSMATES WHEN A GUN WENT  
20110122010502.000|20110122010503.000|CC1|OFF IN HIS BACKPACK HAS BEEN    
20110122010503.000|20110122010510.000|CC1|CHARGED WITH TWO FELONY COUNTS. 
20110122010510.000|20110122010511.000|CC1|LOS ANGELES COUNTY PROSECUTORS  
20110122010511.000|20110122010512.000|CC1|DROPPED THE CHARGES OF BRINGING 
20110122010512.000|20110122010514.000|CC1|A GUN TO A SCHOOL ZONE AND      
20110122010514.000|20110122010514.000|CC1|DISCHARGING IT.                 
20110122010514.000|20110122010516.000|CC1|IF CONVICTED AS A JUVENILE, HE  
20110122010516.000|20110122010518.000|CC1|COULD SPEND UP TO NINE MONTHS IN
20110122010518.000|20110122010519.000|CC1|A DETENTION CAMP OR SEVEN YEARS 
20110122010519.000|20110122010521.000|CC1|IN STATE PRISON IF HE'S FOUND   
20110122010521.000|20110122010522.000|CC1|GUILTY AS AN ADULT.             
20110122010522.000|20110122010524.000|CC1|HIS LAWYER WANTS TO EMPHASIZE   
20110122010524.000|20110122010527.000|CC1|THAT THE SHOOTING WAS AN        
20110122010527.000|20110122010527.000|CC1|ACCIDENT.                       
20110122010527.000|20110122010529.000|CC1|>> NOT CHARGED WITH HAVING      
20110122010529.000|20110122010531.000|CC1|INTENTIONALLY SHOT AT ANYBODY.  
20110122010531.000|20110122010533.000|CC1|THAT'S THE CRITICAL FACT THAT I 
20110122010533.000|20110122010534.000|CC1|THINK EVERYBODY NEEDS TO FOCUS  
20110122010534.000|20110122010534.000|CC1|ON.                             
20110122010534.000|20110122010536.000|CC1|>> THERE WAS ONE BULLET, AND    
20110122010536.000|20110122010537.000|CC1|WHEN THE GUN WENT OFF, THE

20110122010539.000|20110122010541.000|CC1|A 15-YEAR-OLD BOY, THEN HIT A
